name: The High School Interview
description:
FOR BEST EXPERIENCE: PLAY IN FULL-SCREEN MODE.

The idea is that you are a High School Principal trying to hire a capable counselor. You want to hire someone who will give you the correct number of students that he/she is going to acquire to help during the school year. 

The wizard will be a counselor that is going to the hiring interview. The wizard's main goal is to get the job. (You)The principal will only give the counselor 10 tries (# of tries may change, depending on feedback by players).

Game Player = principal

Counselor(interviewee) = wizard
